pages.text: Farming in Beyond the Horizon has been revolutionized with advanced tools and methods. Hoes can harvest crops in larger areas, and right-clicking will replant the crops automatically, making farming more efficient than ever.

For larger scale farming, use the $(l:travel/astikor_carts)plow cart$() to till large areas of land quickly. This horse-drawn cart enhances your ability to prepare fields for planting, speeding up the setup of your fields.

To fully automate your farms, employ the $(l:mod_info/create)Create mod$()'s harvester. This setup allows for the automatic harvesting and collection of crops, streamlining your food production and maximizing efficiency. Garden Cloches from $(l:mod_info/immersive_engineering)Immersive Engineering$() allow full-scale automation of any crop. Additionally, consider using $(l:mod_info/rats)Rats$() and $(l:mod_info/ars_nouveau)Ars Nouveau$() rituals for more innovative farming methods.
Setting up a $(l:mod_info/minecolonies)Mine Colony$() will put the power of an entire colony behind your farming efforts, further enhancing your agricultural productivity.
